amendment.description: To urge the President to release information regarding sources of foreign support for the 9-11 hijackers.

action.text: Amendment SA 2000 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Motion to suspend Rule XVI on SA 2000 not agreed to by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 54. Record Vote Number: 415.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2000.

Amendment SA 2000 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S13431-13435; text: CR S13431) To urge the President to release information regarding sources of foreign support for the 9-11 hijackers.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2000 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to suspend Rule XVI on SA 2000 not agreed to by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 54. Record Vote Number: 415.
